overview: Camila is too used to triumph. Smart and beautiful, she managed to achieve every goal. Camila loves swimming and doesn't know failure. However the water, that has given her success in the recent past, now leads her to the biggest setback of her life: An accident will force Camila to reinvent herself with courage, humor and love.
tagline: What if you get a second chance?
title: Camila's Awakening
